entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a character in the story who has a sardonic tone and asks questions to Dumbledore.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is a phoenix that makes an odd clicking noise while gnawing on cuttlebone.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a character in the story who has a withered hand and is smiling.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is a boy whose soul is not yet damaged according to Dumbledore.

relationships.description: Snape asks questions to Dumbledore about letting him kill himself.
Fawkes is gnawing on a bit of cuttlebone.
Dumbledore asks Snape to help him avoid pain and humiliation.
Draco's soul is not yet damaged according to Dumbledore.
Snape offers to help Dumbledore by letting Draco kill him.
Dumbledore asks Snape to help him avoid pain and humiliation.
